search.query: index=tsm-accnt tsmserver=$tsmserver$ node=$NODE_NAME$ | `filter_nodes("node")` | eval total_in_kb = archive_in_kb + backup_in_kb | eval total_out_kb = archive_out_kb + backup_out_kb | eval total_in_kb = total_in_kb / case("$unit$"=="Kilobytes", 1, "$unit$"=="Megabytes", 1024, "$unit$"=="Gigabytes", 1024*1024, "$unit$"=="Terabytes", 1024*1024*1024, "$unit$"=="Petabytes", 1024*1024*1024*1024) | eval total_out_kb = total_out_kb / case("$unit$"=="Kilobytes", 1, "$unit$"=="Megabytes", 1024, "$unit$"=="Gigabytes", 1024*1024, "$unit$"=="Terabytes", 1024*1024*1024, "$unit$"=="Petabytes", 1024*1024*1024*1024) | eval archive_in_kb = archive_in_kb / case("$unit$"=="Kilobytes", 1, "$unit$"=="Megabytes", 1024, "$unit$"=="Gigabytes", 1024*1024, "$unit$"=="Terabytes", 1024*1024*1024, "$unit$"=="Petabytes", 1024*1024*1024*1024) | eval backup_in_kb = backup_in_kb / case("$unit$"=="Kilobytes", 1, "$unit$"=="Megabytes", 1024, "$unit$"=="Gigabytes", 1024*1024, "$unit$"=="Terabytes", 1024*1024*1024, "$unit$"=="Petabytes", 1024*1024*1024*1024) | eval archive_out_kb = archive_out_kb / case("$unit$"=="Kilobytes", 1, "$unit$"=="Megabytes", 1024, "$unit$"=="Gigabytes", 1024*1024, "$unit$"=="Terabytes", 1024*1024*1024, "$unit$"=="Petabytes", 1024*1024*1024*1024) | eval backup_out_kb = backup_out_kb / case("$unit$"=="Kilobytes", 1, "$unit$"=="Megabytes", 1024, "$unit$"=="Gigabytes", 1024*1024, "$unit$"=="Terabytes", 1024*1024*1024, "$unit$"=="Petabytes", 1024*1024*1024*1024)

choice.value: sum(total_in_kb) AS total_in_kb sum(total_out_kb) AS total_out_kb
sum(archive_in_kb) AS archive_in_kb sum(backup_in_kb) AS backup_in_kb sum(archive_out_kb) AS archive_out_kb sum(backup_out_kb) AS backup_out_kb

input.default: sum(total_in_kb) AS total_in_kb sum(total_out_kb) AS total_out_kb

search.query: timechart $backarch$ | rename total_in_kb AS "Total in" total_out_kb AS "Total out" archive_in_kb AS "Archive in" backup_in_kb AS "Backup in" archive_out_kb AS "Archive out" backup_out_kb AS "Backup out"

search total_in_kb>0 OR total_out_kb>0 | rename _time AS Time total_in_kb AS "Total in ($unit_short$)" total_out_kb AS "Total out ($unit_short$)" archive_in_kb AS "Archive in ($unit_short$)" backup_in_kb AS "Backup in ($unit_short$)" archive_out_kb AS "Archive out ($unit_short$)" backup_out_kb AS "Backup out ($unit_short$)" | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" ctime(Time) | table Time "Total in ($unit_short$)" "Archive in ($unit_short$)" "Backup in ($unit_short$)" "Total out ($unit_short$)" "Archive out ($unit_short$)" "Backup out ($unit_short$)"
